data.name: RSOD
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to the island, a place where civilians are better armed than any government, religion is long forgotten, and a brothel is always within reach. A paradise. At least it was before the Reds invaded.

You are the baddest motherfucker the IT world has ever seen. Nobody cracks your hacks. Your business was destroyed by the Reds, and now you are desperate to get yours. Or, to put it in your language:

The skids scragged the firms and jacked your cybersec gig, and that totemo torques your weave. Cracks and gats bag you coin, and coin bags you better cracks and gats. Own the metro and ghost the occupation force.

Combat


Get aggro in wide-open areas swarming with enemies, or break into living quarters and workplaces to give your victims a fun surprise. Blow your ammo and switch to classic melee weapons, and when that fails, use your cyber skills to pull off feats on the edge of human comprehension.

Exploration


Dive into a world full of conspiracies and corruption. Discover nonsensical architecture and impossible pieces of engineering. Read deranged writings in text files and on walls. The island floats in a world much like our own, but crazier, filthier, and more broken.

Performance


This engine is 100% custom. No C#, Steamworks, networking, Vulkan, or anything else that could waste precious seconds between clicking "play" and having a game on your screen. Even if your laptop is 10 years old, you have no Internet access, and the cooling fan is jammed with sharp cheddar, RSOD always tries to run smoothly because it is optimized.
data.about_the_game:
Welcome to the island, a place where civilians are better armed than any government, religion is long forgotten, and a brothel is always within reach. A paradise. At least it was before the Reds invaded.

You are the baddest motherfucker the IT world has ever seen. Nobody cracks your hacks. Your business was destroyed by the Reds, and now you are desperate to get yours. Or, to put it in your language:

The skids scragged the firms and jacked your cybersec gig, and that totemo torques your weave. Cracks and gats bag you coin, and coin bags you better cracks and gats. Own the metro and ghost the occupation force.

Get aggro in wide-open areas swarming with enemies, or break into living quarters and workplaces to give your victims a fun surprise. Blow your ammo and switch to classic melee weapons, and when that fails, use your cyber skills to pull off feats on the edge of human comprehension.

Even if your laptop is 10 years old, you have no Internet access, and the cooling fan is jammed with sharp cheddar, RSOD always tries to run smoothly because it is optimized.
data.short_description: You're an alpha techbro -- writing code, running cracks, and hitting the shooting range on the weekends. When an oppressive foreign regime interrupts your vacation, it's your job to solve the problem.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or greater
  • Processor: x86 with SSE2 @ 2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB video memory, Shader Model 4.0+
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or greater
  • Processor: x86-64 @ 3 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB video memory, Shader Model 5.1+
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Ubuntu 20.04 or equivalent
  • Processor: x86-64 @ 2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB video memory, OpenGL 3
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Ubuntu 20.04 or equivalent
  • Processor: x86-64 @ 3 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB video memory, OpenGL 4.4+
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages. General Mature Content
